memberdef.name: ec_calibrator_new

memberdef.argsstring: (LinphoneCore *lc, LinphoneEcCalibrationCallback cb, LinphoneEcCalibrationAudioInit audio_init_cb, LinphoneEcCalibrationAudioUninit audio_uninit_cb, void *cb_data)
memberdef.name: linphone_core_start_echo_calibration

detaileddescription.para: Start an echo calibration of the sound devices, in order to find adequate settings for the echo canceller automatically.
